author: Perez Hilton
title: Chrissy Teigen Poses In First Post-Baby Bikini Photoshoot For The Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Edition — Celebrate With More Of Her SeXXXy Pics!
text:
Chrissy Teigen is making that M.I.L.F. $ !!! 
The supermodel has been a cornerstone of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Edition since her debut in 2010. 
But this year's photoshoot is a special one for the 31-year-old, because it's her first bikini shoot where she's showing off that beautiful post-baby bod! 
At first, the swimsuit veteran wasn't on board with posing in a bikini less than a year after giving birth to 10-month-old daughter Luna — but once she hit the sand, Chrissy was right back to her old skintillating self! 
As evidenced by the seXXXy photo (above), we have to say motherhood is definitely working for her !
